name: chef.component.execute
description: This task allows the execution of any Chef component
author: Chef

inputs.name: component
inputs.label: Chef Component
inputs.helpMarkdown: Select the software component to execute

inputs.name: chefendpoint
inputs.label: Endpoint
inputs.helpMarkdown: Select the endpoint to use when communicating with the Chef server

inputs.name: azureendpoint
inputs.label: Azure Endpoint
inputs.helpMarkDown: Azure Endpoint containing the credentials to use to perform a Test Kitchen run

inputs.name: habitatendpoint
inputs.label: Habitat Origin
inputs.helpMarkDown: Origin to use when running Habitat.

inputs.name: arguments
inputs.label: Arguments
inputs.helpMarkdown: Arguments to pass to the component to execute

inputs.name: envvars
inputs.label: Environment Variables
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Allows the configuration of environment variables for the task.
Each key/value pair should be on a new line.
For example `KITCHEN_YAML=$(Build.SourcesDirectory)/build/kitchen.yml`
